duties_responsibilities.duty: Build a book of residual income by actively seeking out business opportunities and engaging potential clients.
Prioritize and manage multiple touchpoints, ensuring follow-through and optimization of networking opportunities.
Engage in face-to-face meetings, networking, and portfolio building to drive sales and solve business owners' promotional and sales challenges.
Maintain client relationships to drive future revenue growth and ensure customer retention.
Train and support high-performance sales professionals, maintaining the standards of the organization.
Maximize earning potential by effectively communicating concepts and being persistent in pursuing sales opportunities.
